span.span: Provides types that allow applications to read and write the components of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了接口和类型表示的主要组成部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档中，命名空间提供了对打包过程，包括数字签名，并的数字权限管理(DRM)控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。In addition to the interfaces and the types that represent the major parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, the namespace provides control over the packaging process, including digital signatures and Digital Rights Management (DRM) of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. 有关详细信息，请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information, see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
